mapper.update: UPDATE TMTRXBANKDKI SET I_ID = #{idSpmCetak}, c_wil_sp2dproses = #{codeWilSp2dproses}, D_SPM_MOHONSKPD = #{tglEdit}, D_SPM_TERIMAKPKD = #{tglEdit}, N_PEG_TERIMAKPKD = #{namaPegTerimakpkd}, N_PEG_PEMBERISKPD = #{namaPegPemberiskpd}, I_PGUN_TERIMA = #{idEdit}, D_PGUN_TERIMA =#{tglEdit} WHERE I_ID = #{idSpmCetak}
mapper.select: select i_id as idUser, i_pgun as namaUser from tmpengguna where i_pgun like 'SP2D%'
